Name: A Steak Temple Panic
About the game: Cooperative game for two players with simple asymmetrical gameplay. One player plays with the keyboard only, while the other player uses only the mouse! A gameplay at the service of the story. Solve a series of crazy mini-games to advance the plot! A crazy narrative adventure worthy of the biggest blockbusters. So that fans of explosive experiences and crazy comedies can live a fantastic epic story together! You are the real actors! Choose the emotion of the characters before each of their interventions, as you feel it! A short experience to savor in one run. Turn your movie/series night into a video game experience to enjoy with friends Play the First CHAPTER for FREE ! Next chapters in DLC. There will be 5 chapters in total ! Plateform : PC Windows Number of players : 2 (local only - or Steam Remote Play) Controls : Player 1 : keyboard only Player 2 : mouse only Steam Remote Play compatible !!! Language : French voices ! English subtitles
